trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Little Rock
There were no other sightings in Little Rock on or around September 13th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsME AND MY OLDER BROTHER WHERE COMING BACK TO OKLAHOMA FROM VISITING MY DAD. AND WE WERE ON THE WEST SIDE OF LITTLE ROCK ARKANSAW, GOING WEST .WHEN I NOTICED IN THE SKY WHAT LOOKED LIKE A GREEN STAR AND A BLUE STAR REAL CLOSE TOGETHER. AND I REALIZED THAT THE WERE CLOSER TO THE GROUND THEN STARS FAR AWAY. AT FIRST THEY JUST SAT THERE THEN THE GREEN ONE TOOK OFF REALY FAST, FASTER THEN ANY PLANE OR ROCKETT THAT HAVE EVER SEEN. AND THE BLUE ONE CAUGHT UP WITH IT JUST AS FAST. AND THEN THEY KINDA DANCED AROUND EACH OTHER FOR 5 TO 6 SECONDS AND SHOT OFF ABOVE THE TREE LINE. AND THAT WAS THE LAST I SAW THEM. I SLAPED MY BROTHER ON THE LEG AND SAID DID YOU SEE THAT. HE WAS LIKE YEAH, I SAW THE WHOLE THING. THEY LOOKED LIKE ORBS OR BALLS OF LIGHT. BUT THEY WHERE VERY DISTINCTIVE OF EACH OTHER. YOU COULD TELL THAT THEY WERE SEPERATE. I WAS AMAZED I HADNT SEEN ANY SIGHTINGS SINCE I WAS A KID. AND
